Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its significance and quality, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to share in the appreciation of this remarkable product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
